code: import React from"react";import{useTranslation}from"react-i18next";import"./LanguageSwitcher.scss";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function LanguageSwitcher(){const{i18n}=useTranslation();const changeLanguage=lng=>{i18n.changeLanguage(lng);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"language-switcher",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:`lang-btn ${i18n.language==='en'?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>changeLanguage('en'),"aria-label":"Switch to English",children:"EN"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:`lang-btn ${i18n.language==='fr'?'active':''}`,onClick:()=>changeLanguage('fr'),"aria-label":"Switch to French",children:"FR"})]});}
